title: UPDATE: Victim in shooting a Northside High student
content:
LAFAYETTE, La. -
A teenager shot today on Moss Street is a student at Northside High, LPSS confirmed.
The young man was walking in the 2000 block of Moss Street, which is fairly near the school, when another teen, now identified as an 18-year-old male, came up to him and shot him multiple times.
The suspect, who was riding a bicycle, ditched the bike in front of a restaurant and fled on foot, police say. He was caught nearby by officers and is being questioned now, but has not yet been identified.
The student who was shot is being treated at a local hospital for what police describe as non life-threatening injuries.
